main event: Four men reported seeing a UFO over La Porte, Texas on the evening of November 8, 1966. The object was seen at about 6:45 p.m. and was observed for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 125 feet in diameter, round in shape, and glowing with a bluish-white color., The object moved slowly across the night sky and then suddenly accelerated and disappeared., The witnesses estimated the UFO was about 1,000 feet in altitude when first observed., The sighting occurred about 25 miles southeast of Houston., The object was tracked for about 10 minutes by the witnesses before it disappeared from sight.
sighted object: UFO described as bright white and round in shape
witness description: The witnesses included four men who observed the UFO for approximately 15 minutes.
